reference.title: Equipment Management

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Covers management of lifting and material handling equipment including inspection, maintenance, record keeping and lifecycle controls.

othermeta.name: taxonomy

othermeta.name: usecase
othermeta.content: manage inspection and maintenance of lifting equipment

ol.li: All lifting equipment, including slings and attachments, must be formally documented in a register.
Ensure that lifting equipment is registered, inspected, and certified in accordance with local legislative requirements.
Ensure that the safe working load tag/rating plate is displayed on all lifting equipment and confirm compliance with periodic inspections.

Undertake periodic inspections, testing, and maintenance of lifting equipment using a trained person. Inspections must include structural and mechanical elements and refer to relevant standards for guidance.
Undertake pre-operation inspections to check condition before use and remove from service if damaged.
